txt.en: Beregond has been defeated!
'DNT - Blah!'
Aragorn is atop the eastern slag hill, ready to engage once more with the enemies that approach.
You hear a scream from above. That was Pippin's voice!
DNT - Blah!
We must rejoin the fight!'
Aragorn has asked you to make your way to the western slag hill and to help soldiers caught in the middle of the fighting.
'My kinsmen and these others have cast back all of the enemy's advances to this point, [placeholder]. We must not fail now!'
(mortally wounded) 'Do not… give up…'
Golasgil has been defeated!
Talk to Beregond atop the western slag hill
We have to do something about those flying beasts!'
The armies of Mordor converge on the slag hills as Aragorn and the Host of the West prepare for the final assault.
DNT - Blah!
Check on Pippin where he lies
(mortally wounded) 'Everything is… darkness…'
'Oh no! Help me!'
The halfling… he saved my life!'
DNT - Blah!
There is no end to this onslaught!'
'DNT - Blah!'
Talk to Beregond atop the western slag hill
'Remember... Gwin...'
Golasgil of Anfalas has been caught between the slag hills and needs your help.
Talk to Aragorn atop the eastern slag hill
'We have to do something about those flying beasts, or there will be no one left to carry on the fight!\n\n'Follow me, [placeholder]! We must find some archers!'
'Follow me!'
Defend Aragorn atop the slag hill
'Get ready! Here comes a big one!'
Golasgil has been thrown to the ground by a great Olog, and now the beast seeks to finish what it began.
'[placeholder]... do you live...?'
Golasgil has been mortally wounded.
Find Calenglad where he fell on the battlefield

'I cannot see you, friend... everything is... darkness...

'I know I do not... do not have long. Fight on... fight on...

'If there is a day to come... after this... look to the people... of Anfalas. Tell them... tell them their lord...'
Beregond is atop the western slag hill, calling for help.

'The halfling... he saved my life! I was stunned and fell beneath the press of battle, but even as the great troll reached out to end my life, Peregrin stabbed it with his blade!\n\n'He slew the beast, but it fell upon him and I fear he is dead!'
Talk to Golasgil between the slag hills
Pippin lies beneath a great Olog atop the western slag hill.
Talk to Beregond atop the western slag hill
DNT - Blah!
'DNT - Blah!'
Defeat the Olog that crushed Golasgil
Talk to Golasgil where he lies
Find Pippin atop the western slag hill
Aragorn is atop the eastern slag hill.
'Berthon! No!'
You have heard Pippin's voice from above the din of battle. He needs your help!
'What happened to all the archers?'
DNT - Blah!
'Thread the needle, [placeholder]! Now is not the time!'
'You should not have gotten in our way, wretches!'
'Golasgil of Anfalas strikes you down!'
'Finish it... [placeholder]... I am...'
The eastern slag hill has come under heavy attack, and Aragorn calls his kinsmen to him for the final defence.
The battle rages all around you, and Beregond intends to rally the forces to keep fighting until the end.
Aragorn has asked you to find Calenglad where he fell, if you can, and ease his pain.

'Do not... give up... [placeholder]. Remember...'

Calenglad coughs weakly, but he smiles despite the pain.

'From above... I saw light. It cannot... be quenched...

'The new age...'

'There is no end to this onslaught, [placeholder]! As long as we remain divided, we are weak. We must move as a group if we are to stand long.\n\n'We must fight back to King Elessar before it is too late!'
'I will stay here and guard Calenglad's body from our foes, [placeholder]. You are needed to the west, between the slag hills, for the soldiers there are hard-pressed! Go, quickly!'
Aragorn has been defeated!
Fight alongside Golasgil
Gondorian Soldier
Great shouting and clamour rises from the west
'We must rejoin the fight, [placeholder]!'
'Nazgûl overhead!'
'Calenglad! Calenglad!'
'[placeholder]! It took him this way!'
'Find him, [placeholder]!'
Talk to Aragorn atop the eastern slag hill
You have found Beregond, but Pippin does not stand with him
'No! No!'
'Calenglad has been taken!'
Stand your ground and defend Aragorn
'There! I see him!'
Help soldiers caught between the slag hills
'Calenglad...'
Pippin does not move
Fight your way back across the battlefield with Beregond
Instance: Mordor Triumphant
